Issue.creator: jjason
Issue.summary: Create Unit Tests for PoET SGX Enclave
Issue.description: The current unit tests for the PoET SGX enclave are more like integration tests. Proper unit tests need to be created, especially when it comes to interaction with the IAS client. The PoET SGX enclave needs to be able to properly handle errors from the IAS client (for example, network timeouts, HTTP error return codes, etc.)
